oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of reunion of Unicoi County Civil War veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Union veterans, some of whom were members of the 8th Tennessee Infantry. They enlisted from Washington County, Tennessee, but their communities were later absorbed by Unicoi County. Additional persons pictured: David McInturff and David Ervin. See also A. Christine Tipton's book, "Civil War in the Mountains."
